original_text: As for the cities of the several Merarite clans, that is, the remainder of the clans of the Levites, those allotted to them were in all twelve cities.
korean_text: 이는 레위 가족의 남은 자 곧 므라리 자손이 그들의 가족대로 받은 성읍이니 그들이 제비 뽑아 얻은 성읍이 열두 성읍이었더라

sentences.original_text: As for the cities of the several Merarite clans
that is, the remainder of the clans of the Levites
those allotted to them were in all twelve cities.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 분배된 것들은 모두 열두 도시였다.
